description: The Antrim squad are hit by an outbreak of sickness ahead of their Division 1B hurling match with Laois on Sunday.
title: Antrim hurling: Saffrons hit by virus ahead of crunch league game against Laois
title_page: Antrim hurling: Saffrons hit by virus ahead of crunch league game against Laois - BBC Sport
